channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Nicki Chapman is in Norfolk with a couple from Northamptonshire who have lived and worked all over the world. With a whopping ?1 million to spend, the globetrotting pair want a property with the wow factor and spectacular views to boot. On the beach, Nicki helps a local chef to cook a classic dish, using seasonal shellfish from the nearby coast.
